name: Chronicles of Vampires: Origins
synopsis: Discover a secret that has been hidden for centuries in this supernatural hidden object adventure. When investigative reporter and super sleuth, Linda Hyde, sets out to cover a rare book exhibition, she receives an offer she can't refuseâ€”to search for lost manuscripts on the behalf of a mysterious collector. However, Linda will soon find out, she is not alone in this quest. A secret world of vampires slowly reveals itself...
